body_html:
thank you guys for the support,

I tried many configurations of my environment, the one posted here is the one suggested in the requirements-gpu-python36-cuda9.txt, but I alsto tried tensorflow 1.7 (from source), 1.6 (installed from pip), and conda too, with no different results.

I also tried:
different versions of tensorflow-gpu, installed from pip, from conda, and from source code
different versions of python (Anaconda)
reducing batch size until 2
different versions of cuda / cudnn
uninstall/reinstall nvidia cuda and cudnn and drivers
reinstall Ubuntu
